Test Description: Tests if model can identify patterns within the dominoes
Difficulty Notes: Model needs to differentiate between the different categories of 'biomes' present.
Question: How many unique biomes are present in the pictured domino halves? Assume the minor details don't matter, rather the high-level patterns/colors/domains.
Rationale: There appear to be 6 different biomes present: green fields, yellow fields, blue water, brown rocky, black mines, and dark green forests.
